root.title: philippin long distanc phi year net
root.body: shr primari 95.30 peso v 29.71 peso shr dilut 61.11 peso v 18.49 peso qtli div 1.25 peso v 1.25 peso net 1.9 billion v 779 mln rev 6.1 billion v 4.7 billion note full name philippin long distanc telephon co figur quot philippin peso dividend payabl april 15 holder record march 13 exchang rate day dividend declar 20.792 peso per dollar
